channel.title: An EVERYDAY error
channel.description:
I put my html code onto my web host and then it showed this error, this was like 1-2 weeks ago and then I [b]jarred & signed[/b] the client again to fix the error, the next day, the [i][u][b]same[/b][/u][/i] error came. [b]Idk[/b] how to fix this. Please help
[code]load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Tony\Desktop\client\class.class (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class[/code]

item.title: An EVERYDAY error
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Go to YouTube.
There’s a guide by Ric914.

Follow that step-by-step.[/quote]
I did 100%

Read full topic

item.title: An EVERYDAY error
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

I Vain I:

Okay, I believe it’s a jarring error.

I put Output Directory - Desktop
Output Jar File - client.jar
Input Directory - My Client
Manifest - main-class - client

Read full topic

item.title: An EVERYDAY error
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Try posting your webclient code?
Also, I think this is an error produced when you jarred or signed the client.[/quote]

[code]

....Scape Webclient <link rel="shortcut icon" href="Icon Link" Forums.
 [/code] I blocked out the forums and icons link

Read full topic

item.title: An EVERYDAY error
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Why is one of your files looking for ‘class.class?’
C:\Users\Tony\Desktop\client\class.class (The system cannot find the file specified)[/quote]
idk, i just opened notepad > put html code> saved it as Webclient.htm > then it opened in a tab

Read full topic

item.title: An EVERYDAY error
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

I put my html code onto my web host and then it showed this error, this was like 1-2 weeks ago and then I jarred & signed the client again to fix the error, the next day, the same error came. Idk how to fix this. Please help

load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\Tony\Desktop\client\class.class (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
